articles.author: Gopika Gopakumar
articles.title: ‘India better prepared to avoid risks of stagflation’
articles.description: The state of the economy article published in RBI’s June bulletin noted that global economic conditions continue to deteriorate as surging commodity prices and financial market volatility lead to heightened uncertainty.
articles.content: India is better placed than many other countries to avoid the risk of stagflation amid an increasing hostile external environment, according to the Reserve Bank of India.
